.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-icon-facebook {
    width: 12px;
    height: 22px;
    background-position: -20px -20px;
}

.sprite-icon-facebook-black {
    width: 12px;
    height: 22px;
    background-position: -20px -82px;
}

.sprite-icon-login {
    width: 18px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -20px -144px;
}

.sprite-icon-vk {
    width: 25px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -20px -200px;
}

.sprite-icon-vk-black {
    width: 25px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -20px -256px;
}

.sprite-instagram {
    width: 21px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: -20px -312px;
}

.sprite-instagram-black {
    width: 21px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: -20px -373px;
}
